original_text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it, and sought how they might destroy him: for they feared him, because all the people was astonished at his doctrine.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 서기관들이 듣고 예수를 어떻게 죽일까 하고 꾀하니 이는 무리가 다 그의 교훈을 놀랍게 여기므로 그를 두려워함일러라

sentences.original_text: And scribes and chief priests heard it,
and sought how they might destroy him:
because all the people was astonished at his doctrine.
